item.title: Ok i have added godswords but still have a prob with em
item.dc:creator: @mudvayne5493 mudvayne5493
item.description:
@mudvayne5493 wrote:

I added all the godswords to my server…you can spawn them on the ground but if you try to pick em up you disconnect and if you try to spawn em in your inven you disconnect…help please

here are my class8.java codes for em

if(i == 15334) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 7211; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 7207;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 7207;//female wearing class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Bandos Godsword";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A heavy sword".getBytes();//examin info } if(i == 15333) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 7212; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 7210; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 7208;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 7208;//female wearing class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Saradomin Godsword";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A heavy sword".getBytes();//examin info } if(i == 15336) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
